body: I create fix #4901 PR with testsüëç

Hi @sbrannen , could you please assign this to me?
Thanks & Regards,
Mehuli

Hi @mehulimukherjee,

Thanks for offering, but I have actually already done the work locally (see https://github.com/junit-team/junit-framework/pull/4901#issuecomment-3252413774).

Regards,

Sam

p.s. Note that the `status: in progress` label indicates that the current assignee is actively working on the issue.

@mehulimukherjee,

As a side note, directly above your comment you can see the corresponding [commits](https://github.com/junit-team/junit-framework/issues/4896#event-19550966379) from my feature branch that reference this issue.
